name: Row your Boat demo
description:
Row your boat is a simple but very challenging game. You have to get to the end of the river, paddling past dangerous rocks, angry hippos and pregnant birds (what?!).

All you have is three buttons (two, if you challenge yourself in hard-mode!) to get through the dangerous desert river! Collect the coins and get to the end as fast as possible to get the most amount of points.

Fun mechanics and animations and not to forget the difficulty make the game worth it's while.

Hint: Secure your keyboard and monitor in place before playing so you don't throw it out of the window!

THIS IS A DEMO VERSION: If you played the game, please take a second to fill out this form! It helps a BIIIIIIIIIG lot to improve it so that the biggest amount of people can have fun playing it! If enough people like it, more levels will be made! Thanks for playing!
